body: Commenting on the corruption in Bangladesh Kazi Rubaiat Imam at The Lunatic Is On The Grass proposes to develop a website where everyone can "see and update the rates of bribes for getting things done at the government offices".
original_body: Commenting on the corruption in Bangladesh Kazi Rubaiat Imam at The Lunatic Is On The Grass proposes to develop a website where everyone can "see and update the rates of bribes for getting things done at the government offices".
title: Bangladesh: How Much For The Desk Clerk?
